description: Sumika`s best friend and classmate, Ushio is a naive girl madly in love with cute girls. She often gets crushes but they are all one-sided. She considers Sumika as a very precious friend, but she`s completely unaware of her feelings and often remarks her for being "cool", "not cute" and "not her type", without knowing Sumika`s inner reaction at these words. She lives alone with her older brother.
name: Kazama Ushio
